markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Energizing Lattice](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1846)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 15 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Lattice Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=27)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This suit of _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [fortification](/Equipment.aspx?ID=285) [lattice armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=27)_ has latticework of fine golden wire. After negating a critical hit with its _fortification_ rune, the latticework glows for 1 minute, shedding [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) in a 20-foot radius (and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) for the next 20 feet). You can Dismiss this light.

<document level="2" id="action-1540" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Energizing Lattice
